trans-unit.source: Represents the `list` element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
This class can be used to define a `simpleType` element as a list of values of a specified data type.
When a data type is derived from a list data type, the following constraining facets can be used: `length`, `maxLength`, `minLength`, `enumeration`, `pattern`, and `whiteSpace`.
For each `length`, `maxLength`, and `minLength`, the unit of length is measured in number of list items.
The value of `whiteSpace` is fixed to the `collapse` value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList"></xref> class.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref> representing the type of the `simpleType` element based on the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemType"></xref> and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemTypeName"></xref> values of the simple type.
This property is a post-schema-compilation-infoset property.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref> representing the type of the `simpleType` element.
Gets or sets the `simpleType` element that is derived from the type specified by the base value.
The base value must be a QName.
The use of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemTypeName%2A> and `ItemType` are mutually exclusive.
The item type for the simple type element.
Gets or sets the name of a built-in data type or `simpleType` element defined in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
The simple type list value must be a QName.
The use of `ItemTypeName` and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeList.ItemType%2A> are mutually exclusive.
The type name of the simple type list.
